name: Custom Discord Bot
description: Fully custom Discord bot built to your server's needs ‚Äî moderation, auto roles, giveaways, and more.
long_description:
ü§ñ Custom-Built Discord Bot

üéØ A Discord bot designed and coded specifically for your server ‚Äî no generic templates, no bloat.

‚ö° What You Can Get:
  - Auto role assignment on join
  - Moderation tools (kick, ban, mute, warn system)
  - Giveaway system with customizable timers
  - Welcome/leave messages with embeds
  - Ticket support system
  - Custom commands tailored to your community

üõ°Ô∏è Built With:
  - Python (discord.py)
  - Clean, readable code you can maintain
  - Hosted on your own VPS or 24/7 hosting guidance included

üì¶ What's Included:
  - Full source code delivered to you

requirements: You provide your Discord server and a bot token (I'll guide you through creating one). I handle the full first-time setup. After delivery, you manage future changes ‚Äî basic Python knowledge helps but isn't mandatory. Hosting guidance included.

name: Custom Telegram Bot
description: Tailored Telegram bot for your shop, support desk, file sharing, or automation workflows.
long_description:
üì© Custom Telegram Bot

üéØ A Telegram bot built from scratch for your exact use case ‚Äî whether it's running a shop, handling support, or automating tasks.

‚ö° What You Can Get:
  - Shop bot with product listings and order flow
  - File sharing/storage bot with categories
  - Auto-reply and support ticket system
  - Scraper bots for data collection
  - Broadcast and bulk messaging
  - User management and admin controls
  - Payment integration (if needed)

üõ°Ô∏è Built With:
  - Python (python-telegram-bot / Telethon)
  - Clean, well-documented code
  - Hosting setup guidance included

üì¶ What's Included:
  - Full source code ownership
